column4: hey when setting up my apache server, when i navigate to a PHP file i am asked to download it. Can anyone Help??
restart apache and it should work
I get an error saying that /etc/init.d/apache command not found
I have restarted the server, still no luck. How would i tell if PHP is correctly installed
put <php? phpinfo(); ?> in a file called index.php on your webserver and view it
Its still requesting me to download it (the index.php file)
can you look in /etc/apache2/mods-enabled and see if php5 is in there
